title: Client or Internet
body: Hi! I have problem with queue. 90% of the time when I start queue I cant accept the match because button shows up like 10 seconds later and its already late to accept. What to do to play? Any suggestions? I am playing like this for few months now. Its really really annoying and drives me crazy! Please help. =^,^=

replies.body: This can happen with an unstable connection, and it seems to be leaving you out of sync with matchmaking.  It's really important to fix this up because constant declines can result in a lower priority queue.  My suggestion would be to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix this up!
